_header: O Our Father that art in bliss
_description: James Ryman, The Pater Noster — two stanzas rhyme royal

CULEe112.First Lines:
O oure fader that art in blisseSanctified thy name mote
                    be…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Into no synne in dede nor willeAnd deliuer vs fro alle
                    ille
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 241.
